content: Anyone else experiencing issues accessing certain documentation on the CESM website? I'm able to access this page Community Earth System Model 2 (CESM2), but for example when I click on Grid Resolutions or Component Sets the site can't be reached. Is there another way to access this information?
It looks like the docs might have moved to GitHub (https://escomp.github.io/CESM), but someone from the CESM team can probably answer more definitively.

@Ben Buchovecky - Are you able to access these pages now? I'm able to access them, but if you still can't, please let us know. (The page @Katelyn FitzGerald pointed to does provide some CESM documentation, but much of the documentation is still hosted at the site you referenced.)
Now I can! Thanks for checking in
